content: I am currently new on HAPI FHIR. I am trying to import a package that contains all the resources, e.t.c through the command : fhir install de.gecco 1.0.3 . I have installed a hapi fhir serve local through the github docker image through docker run -p 8080:8080 hapiproject/hapi:latest. How is it possible to install for testing the above mention fhir package ? I would really appreciate any help. I am fighting for days and I can make it work. Thank you in advance

Hi @Nek L When you post, be sure to change the topic to something specific to your question. (I've moved this so it's no longer under the Immunication vaccineCode thread
This sounds like something you might get more support for by asking on the #hapi stream. You'll need to describe what sort of problems you're running into for people to be able to help you though.
